name: Nagraj misia
description:
In "Nagraj misia" you are a film director, who plays in his own movie. Your movie plan has been invaded by bears. You need to keep them away to survive and finish your piece of art.

Pressing proper button will make every bear of asigned species disappear.

Very first game of promising crochet artist made in 20 hours all by herself.

Made on Warsaw Film School Game Jam 2 (February 2017)
